resources.string: Disconnect your drone from all other devices
Go to your phone/tablet wifi settings
Select the Wifi network of your drone
Authorize a non-internet network in the notifications
Wait a few seconds and enjoy piloting!
Discovery takes too long to be normalâ€¦
Looking for a Parrot device to connect
Parrot device disconnected. Trying to reconnect.
When you are ready to pilot it, \n tap on the \n \"Pilot from wear\" switch.
If you are experiencing too many disconnections\n try putting you\'re drone on a 5ghz band \n (with the Parrot official app).
You can start using your watch \n to move the drone.
